verses.verse: (A Song of Ascents.) To Thee I <S%H5375>lift<s%> up my <S%H5869>eyes,<s%> O Thou who art <S%H3427>enthroned<s%> in the <S%H8064>heavens!<s%>

<S%H2009>Behold,<s%> as the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of <S%H5650>servants<s%> [look] to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of their <S%H113>master,<s%> As the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of a <S%H8189>maid<s%> to the <S%H3027>hand<s%> of her <S%H1404>mistress;<s%> <S%H3651>So<s%> our <S%H5869>eyes<s%> [look] to the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> our <S%H430>God,<s%> <S%H5704>Until<s%> He shall be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to us.
Be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to us, O <S%H3068>Lord,<s%> be <S%H2603>gracious<s%> to us; For we are <S%H7227>greatly<s%> <S%H7646>filled<s%> with <S%H937>contempt.<s%>

Our <S%H5315>soul<s%> is <S%H7227>greatly<s%> <S%H7646>filled<s%> With the <S%H3933>scoffing<s%> of those <S%H7600>who<s%> are at <S%H7600>ease,<s%> [And] with the <S%H937>contempt<s%> of the <S%H1349>proud.<s%>
